alert.note: Alert for Bristol Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 4:43AM AKST until December 22 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Reduced visibilities to as low as one half mile at times. * WHERE...Bristol Bay. * WHEN...Through 3 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A warm front will move into the Southwest coast through the morning hours, eventually reaching Bristol Bay. Ahead of the front, snow has already transitioned into a mix of rain and freezing rain from the Kuskokwim Delta into Bristol Bay as temperatures gradually warm. Minor ice accumulations of up to a tenth of an inch will be possible before precipitation completely transitions to all rain by this afternoon if not sooner.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
